'''Basso Boffin''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Basso was the second child of [[Buffo Boffin]] and [[Ivy Goodenough]]. He was said to have gone to sea in {{SR|1195}}, and was not heard from again.<ref>{{App|Boffin}}</ref>
